img.alt: Proctor Drama Club Presents: High School Musical on Stage!

a.span: Proctor Drama Club Presents: High School Musical on Stage!

div.p: Congrats to the Proctor Drama Club on a very successful run of their show, High School Musical on Stage. View photos from the performance here!

a.title: Go to comments for Proctor Drama Club Presents: High School Musical on Stage!

img.alt: Utica City School District Expands Fresh Fruit and Vegetable Program

a.span: Utica City School District Expands Fresh Fruit and Vegetable Program

div.p: The Utica City School District's Food Service Department has been working hard to promote innovative programs under its new director with the mission of supporting nutrition, wellness and healthy eating habits for all of its students. Read the full story here!

a.title: Go to comments for Utica City School District Expands Fresh Fruit and Vegetable Program

img.alt: Utica City School District Members Honored at Genesis Group’s 14th Annual Celebration of Education

a.span: Utica City School District Members Honored at Genesis Group’s 14th Annual Celebration of Education

div.p: Congratulations to the members of the Utica City School District who were honored on November 21 2019; click here for more information!

a.title: Go to comments for Utica City School District Members Honored at Genesis Group’s 14th Annual Celebration of Education

img.alt: Community Comes Together in Support of Proctor Raiders

a.span: Community Comes Together in Support of Proctor Raiders

div.p: Thank you to our entire district, local businesses, organizations and community members for your overwhelming support of our Proctor Raiders Football Team!

a.title: Go to comments for Community Comes Together in Support of Proctor Raiders

img.alt: Proctor Drama Club Debuts Alice's Adventures in Wonderland

a.span: Proctor Drama Club Debuts Alice's Adventures in Wonderland

div.p: On October 18, Proctor Drama Club debuted their fall production, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland. Click here to read more and view photos from the performances!

a.title: Go to comments for Proctor Drama Club Debuts Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
